Class CommandReaderParser

    • boolShell.CommandReaderParser

    public class CommandReaderParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements Commons
    Reads and parses the input so the commands can be executed without problems
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public java.lang.String[] read()
        Reads the input and solves it for all known commands Uses command constants which are declared in Commons
        Returns:
        Array which contains all command information where the command is saved in first and arguments in rest. If an error occured, error message will be stored in second

      • parse

        public void parse(FormularBuffer formBuff,
         java.lang.String[] arg)
        Parses the user input which was already read by CommandReaderParser Executes the command specific methods which are located at Commands
        Parameters:
        formBuff - FormularBuffer where all Formular should be saved
        arg - Argument array which was already read by CommandReaderParser
